title: Barr Destroys the Mail-In Voting Scam! | Ep 39
description: Steven reviews the latest protests in D.C. over the Deon Kay shooting, Governor Cuomo's threats against Trump, and Pelosi doubling down on her lockdown-violating salon visit. He then turns to examine AG Bill Barr's scathing critique of mail-in voting. Lastly, he takes a look at some of the most outrageous bills up for a vote in California.
